SongLyrics.JpnStr: (ぬん)
SongLyrics.EngStr: (Nun)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: しかのこのこのここしたんたん (x4)
SongLyrics.EngStr: Shika no ko no ko no koko shitan tan

SongLyrics.JpnStr: (ぬん !ぬん !)
SongLyrics.EngStr: (Nun! Nun!)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: しかのこ とことこ あらわる のこのこ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The deer appears, to and fro

SongLyrics.JpnStr: つのつの ぴょこぴょこ 見[み]た目[め]はおにゃのこ?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Horns, horns, bouncing, looks like a girl?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 近頃[ちかごろ]ウワサの なかなかキワモノ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Recently rumored, quite an odd one

SongLyrics.JpnStr: お手並[てなみ]いかほど へなちょこ?
SongLyrics.EngStr: How's your skill, weakling?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: スゴクムカシカラ ジャパンニセイソク
SongLyrics.EngStr: From long ago, residing in Japan

SongLyrics.JpnStr: シカせんべいなら無限[むげん]にください!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Please give me unlimited deer senbei!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: トナカイは仲間[なかま] カモシカはウシ科[しか]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Reindeer are comrades, antelopes are bovine

SongLyrics.JpnStr: でもでもまとめて 偶蹄目[ぐうていもく]
SongLyrics.EngStr: But all together, even-toed ungulates

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぬんのステップで踊[おど]ろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let's dance to Nun's steps

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]が明[あ]けるまで (わん・つー・すりー)
SongLyrics.EngStr: Until dawn (one, two, three)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんどだって反芻[はんすう]して ぬぬぬん
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ruminating again and again, Nun

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 予測不可能[よそくふかのう] シカ色[いろ]デイズ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Unpredictable deer-colored days

SongLyrics.JpnStr: アバンギャルドでオーライ カオス増[ま]し増[ま]し↑↑
SongLyrics.EngStr: Avant-garde is okay, more and more chaos↑↑

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつの間[ま]にクセになって ぬぬぬん
SongLyrics.EngStr: Somehow it became a habit, nununun

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ハチャでメチャな シカ色[いろ]デイズ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Crazy and messy deer-colored days

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 破天荒[はてんこう] ばっちCome on!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Unprecedented, come on!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なん]でもアリ ルールなんてナシ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Anything goes, no rules

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の笑顔[えがお]で元気満[げんきまん]タン
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your smile is full of energy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もしかして運命[うんめい]の ま、ま、My Deer !?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Could it be destiny, m-m-my deer!?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こころのどこかで虎視眈々[こしたんたん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Somewhere in my heart, waiting for a chance

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]とならいつまでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Forever if it's with you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: しかのこのこのここしたんたん (x2)
SongLyrics.EngStr: Shika no kono kono koko shitan tan

SongLyrics.JpnStr: しかのこしか勝[か]たん ! おだてりゃイチコロ ?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Shika no ko shika katan! Flattered and down?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いやいや意外[いがい]と ツワモノかもよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: No, no, surprisingly, maybe a tough one

SongLyrics.JpnStr: やることなすこと ドタバタ騒[さわ]ぎで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Everything they do is noisy and chaotic

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 都合[つごう]が悪[わる]けりゃテレポート !?
SongLyrics.EngStr: If it's inconvenient, teleport!?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ようこそシカ部[ぶ]へ あつまれシカ友[とも]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Welcome to the Deer Club, gather deer friends

SongLyrics.JpnStr: シカになりたけりゃ 険[けわ]しい道[みち]だゾ
SongLyrics.EngStr: If you want to be a deer, it's a tough road

SongLyrics.JpnStr: イマドキＪＫなら 時代[じだい]はシカでしょ
SongLyrics.EngStr: If you're a modern high school girl, it's the era of deer

SongLyrics.JpnStr: シカせんべい片手[かたて]に はい、ポーズ
SongLyrics.EngStr: With a deer senbei in one hand, yes, pose

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぬんの声[こえ]が響[ひび]くよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The voice of Nun resonates

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 地球[ちきゅう]をこえて どこまでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Beyond the earth, anywhere

SongLyrics.JpnStr: クレイジー それって褒[ほ]めてる ?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Crazy, is that a compliment?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: トリッキーでいいじゃん プチョヘンザ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Tricky is good, put your hands up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 神[かみ]の使[つか]いたるシカを崇[あが]めよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Revere the deer, messengers of the gods

SongLyrics.JpnStr: しかのこ神[かみ]の子[こ]万々歳[ばんばんざい] !
SongLyrics.EngStr: Hooray for the deer, children of the gods!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 神[かみ]の使[つか]いたるシカを崇[あが]めよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Revere the deer, messengers of the gods

SongLyrics.JpnStr: しかのこ神[かみ]の子[こ]万々歳[ばんばんざい] !
SongLyrics.EngStr: Hooray for the deer, children of the gods!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 青春[せいしゅん]ってやつかも なんて
SongLyrics.EngStr: It might be youth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: キラリキラリ 輝[かがや]いてるね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Glittering and shining

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 眩[まぶ]しすぎるなら グラサンはい(・∀・)つドゾー
SongLyrics.EngStr: If it's too dazzling, here are some sunglasses (・∀・)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんどだって反芻[はんすう]して ぬぬぬん
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ruminating countless times, nununun

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 予測不可能[よそくふかのう] シカ色[いろ]デイズ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Unpredictable deer-colored days

SongLyrics.JpnStr: アバンギャルドでオーライ カオス増[ま]し増[ま]し↑↑
SongLyrics.EngStr: Avant-garde alright, more and more chaos↑↑

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつの間[ま]にクセになって ぬぬぬん
SongLyrics.EngStr: Somehow it became a habit, nununun

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ハチャでメチャな シカ色[いろ]デイズ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Crazy and chaotic deer-colored days

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 破天荒[はてんこう] ばっちCome on !
SongLyrics.EngStr: Unprecedented, perfect, come on!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なん]でもアリ ルールなんてナシ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Anything goes, no rules

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の笑顔[えがお]で元気満[げんきまん]タン
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your smile is full of energy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もしかして運命[うんめい]の ま、ま、My Deer !?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Could it be destiny, m-m-my deer!?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こころのどこかで虎視眈々[こしたんたん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Somewhere in my heart, waiting for a chance

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 人類[じんるい]シカ化計画[けいかく]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Humanity's deer transformation plan

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんなことはさせない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I won't let that happen

SongLyrics.JpnStr: (でも !)
SongLyrics.EngStr: (But!)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]とならいつまでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Forever if it's with you
